ComicInfo.Title: Close Your Eyes; The Things in the Dark; The Dirty Dog; The Man Who Couldn't Be Killed!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A brother murders his brother for money.
A down and out ventriloquist picks up a stray dog to con a millionaire out of five hundred dollars by convincing the man that the dog can talk. After completing the sale, the dog says to the ventriloquist "You're a sucker, Charlie. You could've got fifty thousand dollars for a dog like me."
A gangster sells his Lady Luck to another thug who rubs him out.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Manny Stallman,Mike Sekowsky,Tony DiPreta,Bernie Krigstein,Manny Stallman,Mike Sekowsky,Tony DiPreta,Bernie Krigstein
ComicInfo.Inker: Manny Stallman,Tony DiPreta,Bernie Krigstein,Manny Stallman,Tony DiPreta,Bernie Krigstein
